name: Nod-Krai: An Elysium of Moonlight and Wanderings (II)

achievements.name: Moondust Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 45 chests in Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.

achievements.name: Moondust Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 90 chests in Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.

achievements.name: Moondust Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 180 chests in Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.

achievements.name: Moondust Adventurer (II)
achievements.desc: Complete 5 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Moonlit Isles (II)
achievements.desc: Light up the maps of the following areas in Nod-Krai: Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.

achievements.name: Frosty Groves Beyond the Darkness (II)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following areas in Nod-Krai: Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Moonlit Isles (II)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Nod-Krai: Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.

achievements.name: Offerings to the Night: Moonlit Isles (II)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the seals on the Kuuhenki's Hidden Troves in the following areas in Nod-Krai: Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.

achievements.name: The Winds Awaken, the Leaves Whirl Round
achievements.desc: A nightingale, bearing an ember in its beak, flew only after dusk.

achievements.name: Si le grain ne meurt
achievements.desc: Even when the flower withers, the leaves still keep their promise.

achievements.name: Joint Meeting Point Construction: Cliffwatch Camp
achievements.desc: Reach maximum Construction Level at the Cliffwatch Camp.

achievements.name: Joint Meeting Point Construction: The Witch's Garden
achievements.desc: Reach maximum Construction Level at the Witch's Garden.

achievements.name: Joint Meeting Point Construction: Favonius Keep
achievements.desc: Reach maximum Construction Level at the Favonius Keep.
